title: adbhuta lIlaigaLai
sahitya:
adbhuta lIlaigaLai yAr arivAr akhilANDa nAyakanE haranE unran


anupallavi

  citparanE shivanE unadaDiyAr shei pizhaigaL
 poruttaruLum enadaiyanE tiru abhayavarak-kaiyan un


caraNam    pATTil AshaiyAl anru bhAvaimanai tUdu naDanda vA viragu shumanda vA
mATTuDaiyAi tillai kATTinilE aruL AttuDaiyAi talai OTTuDaiyAi unnaik-
kATTi maraippA ennai ATTiya alaippAi emmi rATTiyuDanE vATTamara inbam
UTTuvai tunbam OTTuvai unran
